readability_reflection: I found string concatenation more readable because the {} in string interpolation could get confusing with longer strings and I have been using string concatenation more often.
comprehension_debugging: String interpolation did affect my ability to quickly understand/debug code snippets because the {} and () could be a little unreadable on the computer, which required me to look deeper into the question.
preference_rationale: For future programming tasks, I would prefer using string concatenation because just using "+" is more simple for me to understand than string interpolation.
learning_curve: I did have prior experience with string concatenation and it did make it easier for me to the questions using it than when I was answering questions about string interpolation.
suggestions_improvement: No, it was more of a personal issue when reading string interpolation.
